name: Where's the Boat
description:
Where's the Boat is a survival game set on an archipelago of deserted islands. Explore randomly generated islands littered with man made trash. Uncover secrets, ancient treasure and magical creatures while trying to survive.

Current features:

* Around 20 randomly generated islands
* Day/night cycle
* Changing seasons
* 5 different biomes
* Simulation of plants and animals
* Item/tool crafting
* Building structures
* Sailing
* Basic needs and afflictions
